it.polimi.ingsw.GC_28.model

Class BoardsInitializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.GC_28.model.BoardsInitializer

  • public class BoardsInitializer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class initialize gameBoard and playerBoard for the given game and players
    Version:
    1.0, 05/23/2017
    Author:
    nicoloscipione
    See Also:
    GameView,GameManager, GameModel, GameBoard, Excommunication, BonusTile, Dice,Space,PlayerBoard

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void completeExcommunicationArray()
      This method complete the excommunication array in every player.It fills the array with excommunication with null effect, thus it's possible to display the array even if the players has no excommunication.

    • Method Detail

      • initializeBoard

        public it.polimi.ingsw.GC_28.view.GameView initializeBoard(java.util.List<it.polimi.ingsw.GC_28.model.Player> players)
                                                    throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                           java.io.IOException
        This method initialize a gameBoard in every aspect. It is used before the beginning of every game. It return a gameView with a gameModel already set.
        Parameters:
        players - The list of the players playing the game.
        Returns:
        a new gameView every time it's call.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException

      • prepareCell

        private static it.polimi.ingsw.GC_28.boards.Cell[] prepareCell(it.polimi.ingsw.GC_28.cards.CardType ct)
                                                        throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        This method prepare every cell of the Tower of the given card Type. If necessary the method set the bonus reading it from a specific json file.
        Parameters:
        ct - Card type of the tower it's going to set.
        Returns:
        The array of 4 cells that compose the tower structure.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • prepareTower

        private static it.polimi.ingsw.GC_28.boards.Tower prepareTower(it.polimi.ingsw.GC_28.cards.CardType ct)
        This method prepare a tower of the given card type, it builds the tower preparing the four cells necessary.
        Parameters:
        ct - Card type of the tower to prepare
        Returns:
        The tower with its cells and bonus

      • initGameBoard

        private void initGameBoard()
                    throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        This method set every tower in the gameBoard. It prepare every tower, before setting it to the gameboard.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • initCouncilPrivilege

        private void initCouncilPrivilege()
                           throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        This method instance all council privileges. It reads the property of each privilege from a specific json file.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • initSpaces

        private void initSpaces()
                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        This method initialize all different types of spaces of the gameboard. Since the presence of some space type depends upon the number of players in game, this method set different space depending on the number of players.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • initDices

        void initDices()
        This method initialize the three dices. It sets the color and the value and sets them in the gameboard.

      • placeBonusTile

        private void placeBonusTile()
                     throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        This method set bonusTile to every player in game.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • initFamilyMember

        void initFamilyMember()
        This method prepare the FamilyMembers for every player. It sets the color of the corresponding diceColor.

      • initFinalBonus

        public void initFinalBonus()
                    throws java.io.IOException
        This method instance the bonus given at the end of the game. It reads a specific json file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • initPlayerBoard

        private void initPlayerBoard()
        This method prepare the playerBoard for every player. It sets the resource according to the game rules and sets the board to the player.

      • initExcommunication

        private void initExcommunication()
                          throws java.io.IOException
        This method choose randomly which excommunications will be used in game and set them in gameboard.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • completeExcommunicationArray

        private void completeExcommunicationArray()
        This method complete the excommunication array in every player.It fills the array with excommunication with null effect, thus it's possible to display the array even if the players has no excommunication.

      • initLeaderCard

        private void initLeaderCard()
        This method set randomly the 4 leader card to each player.
